metadata.description: Predefined resource names. Should be set to default. The resourse names are generated using the prefix and the suffix. The value is passed when the template is integrated into a complex pipeline.
GitHub repo name. The deployment takes the function app code from the repo and publishes it to the app service.
Used to access a private GitHub repo. Should be empty if the repo is public
GitHub user password or Personal Access Token. Used to access a private GitHub repo. Should be empty if the repo is public
